alert.note: Alert for South and Southeast Grand, West Central and Southwest Boulder, Gilpin, Clear Creek, Summit, North and West Park Counties Above 9000 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 17 at 4:18AM MST until November 18 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 9 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 3 and 8 inches, with lower amounts in Summit and Park Counties. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...The Mountains of Summit County, the Mosquito Range, and the Indian Peaks. * WHEN...From Noon today to 9 AM MST Friday. Snow will become more widespread tonight. * IMPACTS...Travel will be hazardous with slick and snowpacked roads.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Colorado can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by going to www.cotrip.org.

area.areaDesc: South and Southeast Grand, West Central and Southwest Boulder, Gilpin, Clear Creek, Summit, North and West Park Counties Above 9000 Feet
